Texto: 
normal vital signs
tenderness to palpation throughout the abdomen, but no rigidity or guarding
ng suction
frequent abdominal exams
surgery to relieve obstruction
multiple dilated air-filled loops of bowel throughout the abdomen
air-fluid levels on the upright abdominal radiograph
absent bowel gas in the rectum and colon
small bowel obstruction secondary to adhesions
adynamic ileus
small bowel obstruction
closed-loop obstruction
47 year old hispanic male with nausea, vomiting, and abdominal pain.  the patient has undergone 2 abdominal operations in the past.
